website_summaries.verdict: Continuing the legacy of Creepers alongside that of the Suede, the Puma Suede Platform Crushed Gem stages the feminine flair on a higher level by introducing a touch of bling on its toe front. With the comfort and sleekness of the Platform silhouette, the sneaker flashes an extremely stylish profile ready to tackle the streets in its dainty way. Though the glitter in the toe cap implies a high price, the low top sneaker manages to be available in an affordable range.
pros: One astounded user insisted that the Puma Suede Platform Crushed Gem sneakers made her stand out from the crowd which is an attribute she really loves
This kick was a super comfortable sneaker according to many reviewers
Several buyers adored the sneaker’s cute and stylish design
A customer cannot believe how the sneaker made her feel so young again
A handful of wearers find the shoe to run adequately according to their size
One purchaser emphasized that the sneaker was really affordable
cons: After using them for a few times, a wearer noticed that the bling on the front of the Puma Suede Platform Crushed Gem started to peel off

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchases two pair of these and considering my third but it's only been less than a year. The soles wear down quickly and then you have these little pockets within the soles that pick up tiny pebbles. The pebbles rattle around inside your soles and then fall out and scratch up the floor. It's kind of annoying. I wish they were like half the price, considering how quickly the soles wear through.
